html:
Sooo, you can return React components, even with translated content from Server Actions? ✨

Seems really promising, e.g. for lazy loading paginated lists. Would be curious though, if there's a way to cache the returned response since Server Actions use a POST request. pic.twitter.com/XMvG3Mzhy4

— Jan Amann (@jamannnnnn) November 8, 2023

CEO who wants to see it work the first time
Developer who’s code hasn’t worked the first time since hello world

— Ben Awad (@benawad) September 15, 2023
